verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sov'reign in the mountain air
Sov'reign on the ocean floor
With me in the calm
With me in the storm

Sov'reign in my greatest joy
Sov'reign in my deepest cry
With me in the dark
With me at the dawn

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In Your everlasting arms
All the pieces of my life
From beginning to the end I can trust You
In Your never-failing love
You work ev'rything for good
God whatever comes my way I will trust You
(God whatever comes my way I will trust You)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
All my hopes all I need
Held in Your hands
All my life all of me
Held in Your hands
All my fears all my dreams
Held in Your hands

verse.name: e1
verse.lines: God whatever comes my way I will trust You
